name: Math Puzzles Pro
description:
Math Puzzles Pro is a logic game for mobile devices. The game goal is to find patterns and find the solution to each puzzle. The game includes more than 70 puzzles. Each puzzle is unique and requires a player to find uncommon solution.

Math Puzzles Pro can help with developing logic skills, out of the box thinking and mathematical knowledge.

The puzzles are visually presented as if they were written on a chalkboard. The game was created by applabs studio.
